metadata.title: CVE-2021-20316 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A flaw was found in the way Samba handled file/directory metadata. Thisflaw allows an authenticated attacker with permissions to read or modifyshare metadata, to perform this operation outside of the share.

criterions.comment: samba: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
